# Troubleshooting Consult the table below should you encounter problems using your camera. If you donâ€™t find the solution here, contact your local Fujifilm distributor. ## Power and Battery | Problem | Solution | |------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | **The camera does not turn on.** | - **The battery was not charged before first use:** The battery is not charged at shipment. Charge the battery before first use (ðŸ“– 37).
- **The battery is exhausted:** Charge the battery or insert a fully-charged spare battery (ðŸ“– 37).
- **The battery is inserted incorrectly:** Reinsert in the correct orientation (ðŸ“– 34).
- **The battery-chamber cover is not latched:** Latch the battery-chamber cover (ðŸ“– 34). | | **The monitor does not turn on.** | The monitor may not turn on if the camera is turned off and then on again very quickly. Keep the shutter button pressed halfway until the monitor activates. |
